#summary Allows you to view marching affecting you quickly.

 This feature is also available in BOT however the format of viewing is different.

Click TOOLS, Click Marches

<h4>Incomming </h4> – views all incoming attack on your cities.

<h4>Out Going </h4> – views all outgoing attacks from your cities

•	The Get Seed button should be ignored unless you are VERY computer savvy.  

•	Widescreen is optional.

<h4> Reinforcements </h4> – Showing troops encamped at each of your embassies.
